title: NixOS Package PRs for fwupd-1.8.15, plasma-workspace-wallpapers, google-chrome, kactivitymanagerd, gawk-5.2.1, gcc-wrapper-12.2.0 packages
description: NixOS Package PRs for fwupd-1.8.15, plasma-workspace-wallpapers, google-chrome, kactivitymanagerd, gawk-5.2.1, gcc-wrapper-12.2.0 packages on GitHub

items.content_html: Backports #332229 to 24.05, which includes a security update for Google Chrome, and a slight refactoring that introduces Darwin support. I'd not normally backport the Darwin change, but without it, it'll make future version backports much more painful!
items.title: [Backport release-24.05] google-chrome: 127.0.6533.89 -> 127.0.6533.100
